Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class RestoredGameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.RestoredGameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class RestoredGameController extends Controller
The RestoredGameController class is the concrete implementation of the abstract class Controller for the previously saved games restored from file
